metadata.title: CVE-2024-33599 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: nscd: Stack-based buffer overflow in netgroup cacheIf the Name Service Cache Daemon's (nscd) fixed size cache is exhaustedby client requests then a subsequent client request for netgroup datamay result in a stack-based buffer overflow.  This flaw was introducedin glibc 2.15 when the cache was added to nscd.This vulnerability is only present in the nscd binary.

criterions.comment: glibc package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
